function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited data on UV inactivation of viral aerosols","Impact":"Inaccurate engineering control designs and optimization of UV air disinfection for respiratory viral aerosols","Mitigation":"Conduct further research and testing on UV susceptibility of viral aerosols","Technologies":"Advanced UV disinfection technology for airborne viral aerosols","People":"Scientists, researchers, and engineers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Assumption of linear relationship between UV dose and percent survival","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of UV susceptibility of different viruses","Mitigation":"Conduct research on different types of viruses to understand their UV susceptibility","Technologies":"Advanced UV susceptibility testing equipment","People":"Scientists and researchers","Owner":"Laboratories, research institutions"},{"Description":"Effect of nebulization and liquid impingement on the survival of animal viruses","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of viral survival in real-world scenarios","Mitigation":"Conduct studies on the impact of nebulization and liquid impingement on viral survival","Technologies":"Simulation models for studying the behavior of viral aerosols","People":"Scientists, public health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
